original_text:
In your thoughts you will ponder the former terror:
    “Where is that chief officer?
Where is the one who took the revenue?
    Where is the officer in charge of the towers?”
korean_text: 네 마음은 두려워하던 것을 생각해 내리라 계산하던 자가 어디 있느냐 공세를 계량하던 자가 어디 있느냐 망대를 계수하던 자가 어디 있느냐

sentences.original_text: In your thoughts you will ponder
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 생각에서 당신은 곰곰이 생각할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Where is the one who took the revenue?
Where is the officer in charge of the towers?
